channel.title: CVE Feed for Marco Milesi -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Marco Milesi -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-45758|2024-08-02T20:29:31.607Z -- marco%20milesi -- amministrazione%20trasparente
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Marco Milesi Amministrazione Trasparente plugin <= 8.0.2 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45651|2024-08-02T20:21:16.926Z -- marco%20milesi -- wp%20attachments
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Marco Milesi WP Attachments allows Cross Site Request Forgery.This issue affects WP Attachments: from n/a through 5.0.11.

item.title: CVE-2023-34006|2024-08-02T15:54:14.247Z -- marco%20milesi -- telegram%20bot%20%26%20channel
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Marco Milesi Telegram Bot & Channel plugin <= 3.6.2 versions.
